original_text: Araunah and his four sons were threshing wheat. Araunah turned around and he saw the Lord's angel. His sons hid themselves.
korean_text: 그 때에 오르난이 밀을 타작하다가 돌이켜 천사를 보고 오르난이 네 명의 아들과 함께 숨었더니

sentences.original_text: Araunah and his four sons were threshing wheat
sentences.korean_translation: 아르나와 그의 네 아들이 밀을 타작하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and he saw the Lord's angel
